name: She of Little Faith
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Bill Freiberger, Matt Warburton (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Feeling her church cares more about making money then helping people, Lisa drops Christianity for Buddhism.
